the White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan. 28. Oscar

Mike Pence decision ''major coup'' for RGA- David Catanese: Mike Pence decision ''major coup'' for RGA Indiana Rep. Mike Pence isn't running for president, which means a gubernatorial run is almost inevitable. Mike Pence won't formally announce his gubernatorial campaign on Thursday-a state law prohibits announced candidates from raising money during the state legislative session, scheduled to end April-but he fully intends to run for governor, a source with knowledge of his thinking told POLITICO. Mike Pence was Perry's first recruitment call after he became chairman, a source with knowledge of the call told POLITICO, and Mike Pence met in Washington on Wednesday with Virginia Gov.
